title: Lab to determine g on another planet

content.question: An astronaut on a new planet is hanging various objects with different known masses one at a time from a spring scale. The astronaut records the mass of the object and the force readings from the spring scale in a data table and constructs a graph. The astronaut is interested in determining the gravitational field strength <math alttext="lowercase g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> on the surface of this new planet. Which of the following indicates how the astronaut should construct a graph to determine <math alttext="lowercase g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of the new planet and identifies the characteristic of the graph that is equal to <math alttext="lowercase g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: Graph the force as a function of mass; the slope is <math alttext="lowercase g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

Graph the force as a function of mass; the <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-intercept is <math alttext="lowercase g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
Graph the mass as a function of force; the slope is <math alttext="lowercase g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

Graph the mass as a function of force; the <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-intercept is <math alttext="lowercase g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
Graph the force squared as a function of mass; the slope is <math alttext="lowercase g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: Graph the force as a function of mass; the slope is <math alttext="lowercase g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
